LanguageData.VPEH_Bloodfocus.label: Bloodfocus
LanguageData.VPEH_Bloodfocus.description: Rapidly regenerating psyfocus at the cost of hemogen.
LanguageData.VPEH_Bloodmist.label: Bloodmist
